bdi4jade.belief

Interface Belief<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the belief value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    jade.content.Concept, MetadataElement, java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Term
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeliefSet<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBelief, AbstractBeliefSet, PersistentBelief, SoftgoalPreferences, TransientBelief, TransientBeliefSet

    public interface Belief<T>
extends MetadataElement, java.io.Serializable, jade.content.Concept
    This interface represents a belief of the belief base. It has a name and a value associate with it. It is parameterized by the type of the belief value. It extends the MetadataElement interface, allowing to associate metadata with beliefs.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

      Adds a belief base that contains this belief.

      Returns the belief bases with which this belief is associated.

      T getValue()
      Gets the current value of the belief.

      Sets the new value of the belief.

      • Methods inherited from interface bdi4jade.core.MetadataElement

        getMetadata, getMetadata, hasMetadata, putMetadata, removeMetadata

    • Method Detail

      • addBeliefBase

        void addBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Adds a belief base that contains this belief. The agent whose capability contains this belief in the belief base believes in this belief.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be added.

      • getBeliefBases

        java.util.Set<BeliefBase> getBeliefBases()
        Returns the belief bases with which this belief is associated.
        Returns:
        the belief bases.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this belief.
        Returns:
        the string that is the belief name.

      • getValue

        T getValue()
        Gets the current value of the belief.
        Returns:
        the belief value.

      • removeBeliefBase

        void removeBeliefBase(BeliefBase beliefBase)
        Removes a belief base that does not contain this belief anymore. The agent whose capability does not contain this belief in the belief base does not believe in this belief anymore.
        Parameters:
        beliefBase - the belief base to be removed.

      • setValue

        void setValue(T value)
        Sets the new value of the belief.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value.
